course_title: Sex, Lies, and Violence in the Hebrew Bible

001.comments: Visit https://cnrs.ubc.ca/fall2020courses/ for information on course delivery.This course qualifies as 3 credits towards the UBC Literature requirementIf the course is full or blocked, please register in the Wait List. A blocked course with available seats indicated that waitlist transfers have not yet been processed that day. Students will be transferred from the wait list in order of registration.

description: An exploration of the Bible's "dark side," with emphasis on texts that center on sex, deceit, and murder.
